channel.title: PHP Resources
channel.description: Ok, so im going on a trip tomorrow, and I wanted to know if anybody knew of some good offline php resources. I want a book type thing or something. If you can point me somewhere, that would be great. I could use torrent links too.

item.title: PHP Resources
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:
@Wrauld wrote:

[quote=“N00b1, post:6, topic:252097”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=332902.msg2603767#msg2603767 date=1230415494]
http://lan.vollar.net/main/info.php?xid=262 is good if you can norwegian.

go to www.phpvideotutorials.com = > all

just use the flash download addon for firefox [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2008, 05:08:08 pm[/size][hr]in fact he has just updated the site so you can DL them with the link provided

Do you know any good sites with shorter videos.
He Use 33 minutes on something that can be done on 5.
[/quote]

but you won’t forget and he explains it very well and how it can be used if different area’s. but as you watch the more advance stuff, and watch the paid videos he is awesome.[/quote]
I second this. He’s amazing.

Read full topic
